description:
Kamala’s CNN Town Hall last night did not do her campaign any favors, to say the very least. Today’s show breaks down her abysmal event.

It’s unclear if Kamala knows how bad her event went last night but she’s becoming increasingly more unhinged as Trump inches to the finish line. Nonetheless, she spent the night trashing Trump, emphasizing baseless conspiracy theories of things he never said, while failing to prove how she would fix the mess she created.
